column4: hello........ I have a custom google account mail [at] gnuise.co.cc....... i cant connect it via pidgin....... but can be connected in windows gtalk...... pls help.........
in the add account dialog you changed the protocol to google talk ?
i added the same configuration of my gmail account, still it is not connecting
and you put your username in which is the first part of your email (without @gmail.com) ?
user name as mail and domain as gnuise.co.cc
domain should be gmail.com
let me try.........
i added user name as 'mail@gnuise.co.cc' and domain as 'gmail.com', but while saving it is automatically got converted to username ='mail' and domain 'gnuise.co.cc@gmail.com'..........
first of all, do you have a gmail account?
why aren't you using your gmail address then?
mail@gnuise.co.cc........ look at this beautiful mail id..... i cant give up using this...... i can use the chat inside firefox
while login using mail.gnuise.co.cc
you can try using xmpp protocol instead. maybe pidgin won't automatically change it.
can u pls help me.......
google talk uses xmpp, they are essentially the same
no........ still not working
no idea then
i am fed up with this......
had to wait till google release the linux version of gtalk
